Package io.jans.casa.service

Interface LocalDirectoryInfo

All Known Subinterfaces:
IPersistenceService, LocalDirectoryInfo2
public interface LocalDirectoryInfo
Provides location information about important entities of Jans Server

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getClientsDn()
    Returns the DN of the clients branch in your local Gluu Server LDAP.
    String
    getCustomScriptsDn()
    Returns the DN of the scripts branch in your local Gluu Server LDAP.
    String
    getGroupsDn()
    Returns the DN of the groups branch in your local Gluu Server LDAP.
    String
    getIssuerUrl()
    Returns the URL of (this) authorization server.
    String
    getPeopleDn()
    Returns the DN of the people branch in your local Gluu Server LDAP.
    String
    getPersonDn(String id)
    Returns the DN of a person in your local Gluu Server LDAP.
    String
    getScopesDn()
    Returns the DN of the scopes branch in your local Gluu Server LDAP.

  • Method Details

    • getPersonDn

      String getPersonDn(String id)
      Returns the DN of a person in your local Gluu Server LDAP.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of person (inum attribute value). No checks are made with regard to the value passed actually representing an existing LDAP entry
      Returns:
      A string value

    • getPeopleDn

      String getPeopleDn()
      Returns the DN of the people branch in your local Gluu Server LDAP.
      Returns:
      A string value

    • getGroupsDn

      String getGroupsDn()
      Returns the DN of the groups branch in your local Gluu Server LDAP.
      Returns:
      A string value

      Returns:
      A string value

      Returns:

    • getIssuerUrl

      String getIssuerUrl()
      Returns the URL of (this) authorization server. Typically, it has the form https://host
      Returns:
      A string value
